#summary Listing of all view helper functions.
#labels chapter,1.0

These functions can be called from both the controller and the view but are mostly used in the view to create output for use in a HTML page.

==Example==

`views/blog/listauthors.cfm`:

{{{
<cfoutput>
  #paginationLinks(action="listArticles", windowSize=5)#
</cfoutput>
}}}
